A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was probably the best Star Wars film since Empire\, in my opinion. Because this seems to be a very polarizing entry in the saga\, I will give you context: I loved the OT (was raised on it)\, did not like ANY of the prequels (feel they were a major missed opportunity with some very bad writing/dialogue/acting)\, enjoyed the Clone Wars series (much better character development than the prequels)\, and loved both The Force Awakens and Rogue One. If your opinions align with those\, I think you're in for a good time. Just go in free of any expectations except that Rian Johnson is trying to do something bold and new with the series while retaining its heart and soul. I feel he accomplished that and will be recognized and applauded for it in the long run.
